title: Scientific American - How to Unleash Your Creativity
content:
[http://www.sciam.com/article.cfm?id=how-to-unleash-your-creativity](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093709/http:/www.sciam.com/article.cfm?id=how-to-unleash-your-creativity "http://www.sciam.com/article.cfm?id=how-to-unleash-your-creativity")

Nice round-table discussion on what helps develop creativity and get the stagnant waters flowing again. It’s a long but interesting read. Enjoy.
